Wanna know more?

Who am I?

This is Arjune. 28 years old. A surprisingly good looking dude who likes to code, yes. An experienced Front-End developer with a background in computer science, web technologies and Human-Computer Interaction. I also love designing and been wanting to do more of it.

What I do?

Doing what I do best, at Staples. I've been working there for more than a year. I live in the land of opportunities, USA and nothing makes me more happier.

Why I do?

Building user interfaces is my passion. I love solving UI related problems. Articulate, good presentation skills, excellent sense of humor and the ability to thrive well in a group situation are my positives.
